content:
1. is there a reference implementation (source code level or detail design level) of VMR which we can learn?
  2. FHIR is the interoperability standard for information exchange. however FHIR resources actually are all patient record related info, therefore there must be a fair overlap between FHIR resources and VMR, right?

Do you mean Virtual Medical Record?
If so: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/comparison-other.html

Yes, I would say that FHIR provides a good foundation for defining a virtual medical record. The QI-Core profiles, and specifically the QUICK logical view/model are what the CQI and CDS work groups have been working towards.
